name: BlindMatrix Freemium
author: Blindmatrix

sections.description:
BlindMatrix freemium plugin, transforms your website into a comprehensive blind store within the window covering industry with its innovative Window Blinds Solution. List and showcase a diverse array of blinds, enticing customers with SEO features to boost visibility and attract traffic. Experience the transformation of your online presence into a dynamic hub for window covering enthusiasts.

Contributors

  • Blindmatrix e-Commerce
sections.installation:
From WordPress backend

  1. Navigate to Plugins -> Add new.
  2. Click the button “Upload Plugin” next to “Add plugins” title.
  3. Upload the window-blinds-solution.zip file and activate it.

Direct upload

  1. Upload the downloaded zip file into your wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  2. Unzip the uploaded zip file.
  3. Navigate to Plugins menu on your WordPress admin area.
  4. Activate this plugin.
